title:
Fast energy decay for damped wave equations with a potential and
  rotational inertia terms
authors: Ruy Coimbra Char\~ao and Ryo Ikehata
abstract:
We consider damped wave equations with a potential and rotational inertia
terms. We study the Cauchy problem for this model in the one dimensional
Euclidean space and we obtain fast energy decay and L^2-decay of the solution
itself as time goes to infinity. Since we are considering this problem in the
one dimensional space, we have no useful tools such as the Hardy and/or
Poincar\'e inequalities. This causes significant difficulties to derive the
decay property of the solution and the energy. A potential term will play a
role for compensating these weak points.
